title: NAO review highlights cost overruns in major equipment programmes
summary: Audit review finds recurring schedule delays and cost growth across several programmes; recommends stronger portfolio management and transparency.
solutions: Publish programme dashboards for external scrutiny.

title: Opinion: Risk aversion is choking innovation in defence procurement
summary: Argues incentives push officials to avoid failure rather than deliver capability; suggests regulatory sandboxes and outcome-based contracts.
solutions: Create time-bound sandboxes for novel tech.
Use outcome-based KPIs instead of inputs.

title: Barriers to entry: SMEs and the compliance burden
summary: Explores qualification hurdles, security clearances, and payment terms that disadvantage SMEs entering the defence supply chain.
solutions: Faster payment rails for small suppliers.

title: Industrial base capacity and skills shortages in shipbuilding
summary: Notes backlog and workforce gaps; advocates multi‑year funding and modular open systems to smooth demand and speed upgrades.

title: Pushdown procurement: empowering commanders to buy iteratively
summary: Case for devolved, outcome‑focused purchasing with clear spend authority and lightweight controls to accelerate adoption.
solutions: Delegate capped authority with fast audit trails.
